summary: Frontend testing of navigation changes and seed data verification. All requested features verified: 1) Workspace top nav shows Chat > Channels > Tasks > Approvals (no Dashboard), 2) Left nav has no Reports button, 3) /workspace redirects to /workspace/chats, 4) Seed data visible across all modules.

console_warnings.issue: React key warning - 'Encountered two children with the same key' for REV-LEAD-* IDs

critical_code_review_comments: Minor: React key duplication warning in Leads list - some lead IDs appear to be duplicated causing React key warnings

success_rate.frontend: 100% - All navigation and seed data features verified

seed_data_creation: Seed data already created by main agent - verified presence in UI
context_for_next_testing_agent: Navigation changes confirmed working. Seed data visible in all modules. Minor React key warning in Leads list.

chat_tab_present.description: Chat tab is first in top navigation

channels_tab_present.description: Channels tab is second in top navigation

tasks_tab_present.description: Tasks tab is third in top navigation

approvals_tab_present.description: Approvals tab is fourth in top navigation

no_dashboard_tab.description: Dashboard tab is NOT present in workspace top navigation

correct_order.description: Order is exactly: Chat > Channels > Tasks > Approvals

no_reports_button.description: Reports button is NOT present in left navigation

workspace_button_present.description: Workspace button present in left navigation

solutions_button_present.description: Solutions button present in left navigation

intelligence_button_present.description: Intelligence button present in left navigation

leads_page.description: 184 Total Leads with deal values in ₹ (Rupees) - values like ₹2,500,000, ₹5,000,000, ₹8,000,000, ₹10,000,000

finance_receivables.description: Finance Billing Queue shows data with ₹ values (₹5,00,000, ₹1,00,000, ₹2,50,000)

workspace_tasks.description: 100 Total Tasks (96 Open, 4 Completed) with estimated values

workspace_approvals.description: 22 Pending approvals with deal values in ₹ (₹1,500,000, ₹6,000,000, etc.)

intelligence_signals.description: 5 Total Signals (2 Critical, 2 Warning, 1 Info) including Invoice Overdue, Project Behind Schedule, Cash Reserve Low

verification_summary.navigation_changes: All 4 navigation requirements verified: Chat first, no Dashboard, no Reports, correct redirect
verification_summary.seed_data: ₹100 Cr financial year data visible across Leads (184), Tasks (100), Approvals (22), Signals (5)
